channel.title: Significant Battles or Wars Before 1000
channel.description: RSS feed of significant battles or wars before the year 1000.

item.title: Hoadley's Battle of the Sounds
item.description: Hoadley's Battle of the Sounds was an annual national rock/pop band competition held in Australia from 1966 to 1972. The winners of the national finals were the Twilights (1966), the Groop (1967), the Groove (1968), Doug Parkinson in Focus (main, 1969) and the Affair (vocal group, 1969), the Flying Circus (1970), Fraternity (1971) and Sherbet (1972).
